EmailTemplate.name: New User Form
EmailTemplate.subject: New User Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
You are receiving this email in response to your request for access to Salesforce.
What you must do? Please complete the form (link below) and submit it online by pressing the ‘Submit’ button at the end of the form.
Note: If you are requesting a license for a new joiner in IHS Markit, we cannot progress the application until the new joiner has been assigned with an email address.
Please ensure that you have requested the new joiner’s email credentials from ServiceDesk and received a confirmation of the email address before continuing.
New User Form
What happens next? Once we receive the form submitted by you, we will assign a Salesforce Licenses to the new user upon which they will be notified.
IHS Markit Salesforce Helpdesk contact details Please reach out to Salesforce Helpdesk for any further queries or assistance at salesforce@ihsmarkit.com.
We work proactively in resolving all the salesforce related queries at the earliest.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Salesforce Configuration Team
